Pre-Installation

Download

  1. Select preferred Arch Linux mirror1):

    $ MIRROR='https://geo.mirror.pkgbuild.com/iso/latest'

  2. Download Arch Linux ISO:

    $ curl -LO "${MIRROR}/archlinux-x86_64.iso"

Verify Download

  1. Download ISO signature and checkum:

    $ curl -LO "${MIRROR}/archlinux-x86_64.iso.sig"
$ curl -LO "${MIRROR}/sha256sums.txt"

  2. Verify ISO authenticity and integrity:

    $ gpg --keyserver-options auto-key-retrieve --verify archlinux-x86_64.iso.sig archlinux-x86_64.iso
$ sha256sum --ignore-missing -c sha256sums.txt

Flash USB

  1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash USB with disk image:

    # dd if=archlinux-x86_64.iso of=</dev/sdX> status=progress ; sync

USB Boot

  1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key2) to boot into UEFI.
  2. Make sure that Secure Boot is disabled and reboot.
  3. On next POST phase, press Boot Menu key3) and select (UEFI) USB entry.
1)
List of Arch Linux mirrors: https://archlinux.org/mirrors.
2) , 3)
List of POST keys according to vendor: https://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
